```{r}
Genus_aov_n15 <- aov(N15 ~ Genus, data = nitrogen_data)
summary(Genus_aov_n15)
Genus_aov_per <- aov(Percent ~ Genus, data = nitrogen_data)
summary(Genus_aov_per)
plot(Genus_aov_n15)
plot(Genus_aov_per)
TukeyHSD(Genus_aov_n15)

```

```{r}
kruskal.test(N15 ~ as.factor(Genus), data = nitrogen_data)
kruskal.test(Percent ~ as.factor(Genus), data = nitrogen_data)
```

```{r}
summary(aov(N15 ~ Genus, data = shallow))
plot(aov(N15 ~ Genus, data = shallow))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Genus, data = shallow))
plot(aov(Percent ~ Genus, data = shallow))

summary(aov(N15 ~ Genus, data = mesophotic))
plot(aov(N15 ~ Genus, data = mesophotic))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Genus, data = mesophotic))
plot(aov(Percent ~ Genus, data = mesophotic))
```

```{r}
summary(aov(N15 ~ Zone, data = nitrogen_data))
summary(aov(Percent ~ Zone, data = nitrogen_data))
plot(aov(Percent ~ Zone, data = nitrogen_data))
plot(aov(N15 ~ Zone, data = nitrogen_data))
```
